data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Yalin, Gao, Xia, Huang, Min (2009): First record of the leafhopper genus Yangida Dworakowska (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae: Zyginellini) from China, with description of one new species. Zootaxa 2204: 63-66, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.189697
